msg: Changes to hide the creation of PrintWriters.  Changes to make StylesheetConstructionContext responsible for the lifetime of stylesheets.  Implemented other input source options in XSLTInputSource and other output source options in XSLTResultTarget.

msg: Added context push/pop objects so we no longer need try blocks.
